summary: Iteration 84: Full Testing of Dev Control Module - All backend APIs (20/20 tests pass) and frontend UI features work correctly. The module includes Architecture visualization, Modules overview, Dev principles, API Reference (773 endpoints), Roadmap tracking, and Annotations CRUD system.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/dev-control/architecture requires auth (401 without token)
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/architecture returns backend and frontend file trees
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/endpoints requires auth (401 without token)
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/endpoints returns grouped routes with 773+ endpoints
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/modules requires auth (401 without token)
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/modules returns 13 modules with status badges
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/principles requires auth (401 without token)
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/principles returns categorized principles (Backend, Frontend, Database, Integrations)
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/roadmap requires auth (401 without token)
Backend: GET /api/dev-control/roadmap returns P0-P3 items with status
Backend: PUT /api/dev-control/roadmap/{id} updates roadmap item status
Backend: Annotations CRUD - GET returns list
Backend: Annotations CRUD - POST creates with title, content, category, pinned
Backend: Annotations CRUD - PUT updates annotation fields
Backend: Annotations CRUD - DELETE removes annotation
Backend: Annotations CRUD - POST without content returns 400
Backend: Error handling - 404 for non-existent roadmap item
Backend: Error handling - 404 for non-existent annotation update
Backend: Error handling - 404 for non-existent annotation delete
Backend: All endpoints properly require admin authentication
Frontend: Control Dev sidebar nav item visible and clickable
Frontend: Dev Control module loads with data-testid='dev-control-module'
Frontend: All 6 tabs present - Anotaciones, Arquitectura, Modulos, Principios, Referencia API, Hoja de Ruta
Frontend: Architecture tab shows Backend and Frontend (src) file trees with filter
Frontend: Modules tab shows 13 module cards with status badges (all 'active')
Frontend: Modules tab has dev_control, auth, store cards with endpoints
Frontend: Principles tab shows categorized guidelines (Backend, Frontend, Database, Integrations)
Frontend: API Reference tab shows 773 endpoints grouped by tag with method badges
Frontend: API Reference tab has working filter (data-testid='api-filter')
Frontend: Roadmap tab shows P0-P3 items with status dropdowns
Frontend: Roadmap status dropdowns functional for updating item status
Frontend: Annotations tab - New Note button works (data-testid='add-annotation-btn')
Frontend: Annotations tab - Create form with title, content, category, pin checkbox
Frontend: Annotations tab - Save annotation works (data-testid='save-annotation-btn')
Frontend: Annotations tab - Search filter works (data-testid='annotations-search')
Frontend: Annotations tab - Category filter works (data-testid='annotations-category-filter')
Frontend: Annotations tab - Delete annotation works with confirmation dialog
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - module uses existing database collections (dev_annotations, dev_roadmap)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dev Control module is fully functional. Backend endpoints at /api/dev-control/* all require admin auth and work correctly. Frontend module renders at /admin#devcontrol with 6 tabs. Architecture introspection shows real file trees from /app/backend and /app/frontend/src. API Reference dynamically lists 773 endpoints from FastAPI routes. Roadmap items persist to MongoDB collection 'dev_roadmap'. Annotations CRUD persists to 'dev_annotations' collection. All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing.
